item.title: Senate committee to vote today on RFK Jr.'s nomination
item.description: The Senate Finance Committee is considering Robert F. Kennedy Jr.'s nomination Tuesday, with a key vote on whether to advance his confirmation to lead...

item.title: Tulsi Gabbard faces crucial Senate committee vote on intel chief nomination
item.description: The committee vote on President Trump's pick to be director of national intelligence is expected to be close.

item.title: Pharmacist convicted in husband's poisoning death gets life in prison
item.description: Natalie Cochran poisoned her husband with insulin so that he wouldn't find out about a $2 million Ponzi scheme she operated, prosecutors said.

item.title: Fear for life of journalist jailed amid Georgian government crackdown
item.description: The mother of one of Georgia's dozens of imprisoned protesters says the nation "chose Europe," but is being "taken to Russia" by force.

item.title: Rubio says El Salvador made "extraordinary" offer to U.S. on deportees
item.description: U.S. Secretary of State Marco Rubio says El Salvador's president has offered to accept deportees from the U.S. of any nationality, including Americans...
